There is ample space in our private parking facilities.The interior spaces of the hotel composes a traditional, ambient environment of harmony, peace and the charm of Pelion mountain. Relish your afternoon coffee near the fireplace, at the most welcoming lounge of Pelion.Hotel offers a restaurant, a cafe-bar and a lounge with fireplace. All rooms are equipped with central heating - air conditioning, 5 double rooms with fireplace, mini bar in every room, Wi-Fi,LCD TV 26'', Doubleglazed soundproof windows, electronic keys and safe deposit box.One room for people with disabilities is available.

Hotel is located in Portaria surrounded by the beautiful nature of Mt Pelion, dotted with springs and coble streets, suitable for vacations throughout the year. Be sure to visit the horse riding club and the skiing centre of Pelion for experiences of a life time. Portaria is situated 12Km northeast of Volos.You can get to the hotel through Volos' ring-road or from inside the city.
